GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15 to before v5.18.6
GSD.description:
usb: dwc2: Fix memory leak in dwc2_hcd_init

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.6 by commit 52bfcedbfd5bf962dbdcb6e761f4d0dd3ba26dfd, it was introduced in version v5.15 by commit 856e6e8e0f9300befa87dde09edb578555c99a82. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: usb: dwc2: Fix memory leak in dwc2_hcd_init
OSV.details:
